```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Interpolate the locations of values within an ordered vector viewed from left to right.

Inpsired by [locate() from numerical recipes](http://www.numerical.recipes/}{locate() from numerical recipes), `base::findInterval()` [VALUE_LOCATE() from IDL](https://www.l3harrisgeospatial.com/docs/value_locate.html).

### Requirements

 + [R v4+](https://www.r-project.org/)

### Installation

```
remotes::install_github("BigelowLab/locate")
```


### Examples

```{r}
library(locate)

x <- c(13, 7, 22)
locate(x, 10:19)
locate(x, 19:10)

x <- c("zoo", "dog", "fish", "cat")
locate(x, letters)
locate(x, letters, USE.NAMES = FALSE)

```
